alert.note: Alert for Golden Valley; Melville Foothills; Northern Sweet Grass; Southern Wheatland (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 05 at 4:17PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Wheatland, western Golden Valley and north central Sweet Grass Counties through 445 PM MDT... At 416 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 12 miles south of Harlowton, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail, along with brief heavy rain. This storm may be producing a large amount of small hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of south central Wheatland, western Golden Valley and north central Sweet Grass Counties. The storm has tracked east of highway 191. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
